text:
UNIVERSITY OF MIAMI
CORAL GABLES (UNIVERSITY BRANCH) 46, FLORIDA
THE LIBRARY
December 29, 1953
National Association
Educational Broadcasters
2500 Municipal Bldg*
New York 7, N. Y.
Gentlemen:
We request the availability and the cost of the material
listed below. This inquiry is not to be considered as an
order. Books are acceptable only when shipped on an official
University purchase order as issued by the Purchasing Agent.
Very truly yours,
C. L.- Morgan, Jr. $
Acquisitions Librarian
Three Years of New York Television (1953)
